headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Dahua NVR cameras with CGI auto-discovery, motion detection, and FFmpeg streaming.
footerDisplay: For help and documentation, visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/yourusername/homebridge-dahua-ultimate).

name.title: Platform Name
name.description: The name that will appear in your Homebridge log.

host.title: NVR IP Address / Hostname
host.description: The IP address or hostname of your Dahua NVR.

port.title: NVR Port
port.description: The HTTP port of your NVR (typically 80 or 8080).

secure.title: Use HTTPS
secure.description: Enable if your NVR uses HTTPS.

forceDiscovery.title: Force Discovery
forceDiscovery.description: Enable to re-discover cameras on next restart. New cameras will be added, existing cameras will keep their settings.

streamType.title: Default Stream Type
streamType.description: The default stream type to use for cameras. Substream may reduce CPU usage if already H.264.

probeOnStartup.title: Probe Streams on Startup
probeOnStartup.description: Run ffprobe to detect stream properties on startup. Useful for debugging but adds startup delay.

probeTimeout.title: Probe Timeout (ms)
probeTimeout.description: Timeout for ffprobe when probing streams.

videoProcessor.title: Custom FFmpeg Path
videoProcessor.description: Path to custom FFmpeg binary. Required for hardware encoders (VAAPI, NVENC, QuickSync, etc.) as the bundled FFmpeg doesn't include hardware support. Leave empty to use bundled FFmpeg (software encoding only).

interfaceName.title: Network Interface
interfaceName.description: Network interface to use for streaming. Leave empty to auto-detect.

debugMotion.title: Debug Motion Events
debugMotion.description: Enable verbose logging for motion detection events.

channelId.title: Channel ID
channelId.description: The NVR channel number for this camera.

name.title: Camera Name
name.description: Display name for this camera in HomeKit.

streamType.title: Stream Type
streamType.description: Override the global stream type for this camera.

motion.title: Enable Motion Sensor
motion.description: Expose a motion sensor for this camera triggered by ISAPI events.

motionTimeout.title: Motion Timeout (seconds)
motionTimeout.description: Seconds after motion trigger to reset the sensor. 0 = manual reset only.

unbridge.title: Unbridge Camera
unbridge.description: Run this camera as a separate accessory. May improve performance but requires manual pairing.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Set to false to disable this camera without removing it from config.

source.title: Source
source.description: FFmpeg source options. Auto-generated if empty. Override with custom RTSP URL if needed.

stillImageSource.title: Still Image Source
stillImageSource.description: FFmpeg options for snapshot source. If empty, uses main source.

maxStreams.title: Max Concurrent Streams
maxStreams.description: Maximum number of simultaneous streams for this camera.

maxWidth.title: Max Width
maxWidth.description: Maximum video width. HomeKit max is 1920.

maxHeight.title: Max Height
maxHeight.description: Maximum video height. HomeKit max is 1080.

resolutionMode.title: Resolution Mode
resolutionMode.description: How to handle HomeKit's resolution requests. Adaptive (default) allows HomeKit to start at low resolution and upgrade. Force modes override HomeKit requests - useful for VAAPI and other hardware encoders that work better at fixed resolutions.

customWidth.title: Custom Width
customWidth.description: Custom width when resolutionMode is 'force-custom'. Must be set if using force-custom mode.

customHeight.title: Custom Height
customHeight.description: Custom height when resolutionMode is 'force-custom'. Must be set if using force-custom mode.

maxBitrate.title: Max Bitrate (kbps)
maxBitrate.description: Maximum video bitrate in kilobits per second. Default 2000kbps (2Mbps) for good quality.

minBitrate.title: Min Bitrate (kbps)
minBitrate.description: Minimum video bitrate. Overrides HomeKit if set higher.

encoder.title: Video Encoder

oneOf.title: VAAPI - Intel/AMD GPU on Linux (requires custom FFmpeg with VAAPI)
NVIDIA NVENC - NVIDIA GPU (requires custom FFmpeg with NVENC)
Intel QuickSync - Intel CPU with iGPU (requires custom FFmpeg with QSV)
AMD AMF - AMD GPU (requires custom FFmpeg with AMF)

encoder.description: Hardware encoder type. Reduces CPU usage by 70-90%. The plugin automatically: (1) detects if input is H.264/H.265 for hardware decode, (2) configures proper filters (scale_vaapi, hwupload, etc.), (3) sets optimal encoder options. For VAAPI with H.264/H.265 input: full GPU pipeline (decode→scale→encode). For other codecs: CPU decode, GPU scale+encode. IMPORTANT: You must set a custom FFmpeg path in Global Advanced settings - the bundled FFmpeg does not include hardware support.

qualityProfile.title: Quality Profile (Hardware Encoders Only)

oneOf.title: Speed - Fastest encode, lower quality (no B-frames, larger GOP)
Balanced - Good balance (no B-frames, medium GOP) [Recommended]
Quality - Best quality, slower encode (B-frames, smaller GOP)

qualityProfile.description: Quality profiles automatically configure encoder-specific options when 'Custom Encoder Options' is empty. VAAPI: Speed (-quality 1, GOP 25), Balanced (-quality 4, GOP 19), Quality (-quality 7, GOP 13, B-frames). NVENC: Speed (-preset p1), Balanced (-preset p4), Quality (-preset p7). QuickSync: Speed (-preset veryfast), Balanced (-preset medium), Quality (-preset slow). AMF: Speed/Balanced/Quality (-usage transcoding with quality flags). Software (libx264): Always uses '-preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency'. Leave empty to use encoder defaults (recommended). Check Homebridge logs to see actual FFmpeg command used.

hwaccelDevice.title: Hardware Device Path (Advanced)
hwaccelDevice.description: Hardware device path. Default: /dev/dri/renderD128 for VAAPI. Only change if you have multiple GPUs or need a different device.

audio.title: Enable Audio
audio.description: Enable audio streaming. HomeKit will automatically choose Opus or AAC-ELD codec based on device compatibility.

recording.title: Enable HomeKit Secure Video (HKSV)
recording.description: Enable HomeKit Secure Video recording. Records video to iCloud when motion is detected. Requires: (1) iCloud storage plan (50GB for 1 camera, 200GB for up to 5 cameras), (2) HomeKit hub (HomePod, Apple TV, or iPad), (3) Motion detection enabled on camera. Cameras should be unbridged for best HKSV performance.

prebuffer.title: Enable Prebuffering for HKSV
prebuffer.description: Enable prebuffering to capture video seconds BEFORE motion is detected. Continuously records last 4 seconds to memory. When motion triggers, sends prebuffer + live stream to HomeKit. Recommended for best HKSV experience. Requires 'recording' to be enabled.

prebufferLength.title: Prebuffer Duration (milliseconds)
prebufferLength.description: Prebuffer duration in milliseconds. Default 4000ms (4 seconds). Longer duration captures more pre-motion video but uses more memory. Only used if prebuffering is enabled.

videoFilter.title: Custom Video Filter (Advanced)
videoFilter.description: Custom FFmpeg video filter. Leave empty - the plugin automatically uses the correct filter (scale_vaapi, scale_cuda, scale_qsv, etc.) based on your encoder selection. Only override if you need custom filtering.

encoderOptions.title: Custom Encoder Options (Advanced)
encoderOptions.description: Manual override for encoder options. If EMPTY, the plugin uses 'Quality Profile' settings automatically. If FILLED, this completely overrides the quality profile. Examples: VAAPI '-quality 1 -g 30 -bf 0', NVENC '-preset p4 -tune ll', Software '-preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency'. The actual FFmpeg command is logged in Homebridge logs for verification. Only use if you need specific tuning beyond quality profiles.

packetSize.title: Packet Size
packetSize.description: RTP packet size. Try smaller values if video is choppy. Must be multiple of 188.

mapvideo.title: Video Stream Map (Advanced)
mapvideo.description: FFmpeg stream mapping for video (e.g., '0:v:0'). Leave empty to let FFmpeg auto-detect the video stream. Only set this if auto-detection fails.

mapaudio.title: Audio Stream Map (Advanced)
mapaudio.description: FFmpeg stream mapping for audio (e.g., '0:1' or '0:a:0'). Leave empty to let FFmpeg auto-detect the audio stream. Only set this if auto-detection fails.

debug.title: Debug FFmpeg Output
debug.description: Show FFmpeg output in Homebridge log.
